company.description: ABC Lighting Corporation is a leading provider of innovative, eco-friendly lighting solutions specializing in solar-powered outdoor lights. Our goal is to brighten your world sustainably.

productDetails.name: SolarMax Street Light
productDetails.description: The SolarMax Street Light is a commercial-grade solar-powered LED street light designed for urban, industrial, and municipal use. It provides consistent illumination throughout the night with zero electricity cost.
features: Remote control with multiple brightness modes
productDetails.warranty: 5 years on the solar panel, 3 years on battery and electronics

faq.question: Can it work in cloudy weather?
faq.answer: Yes, the SolarMax stores power in its high-capacity battery to function for up to 2 days without sunlight.

faq.question: Is professional installation required?
faq.answer: While professional installation is recommended for municipalities, individual units can be installed with basic tools.

productDetails.name: DriveLite Pro
productDetails.description: DriveLite Pro is a sleek, durable solar-powered driveway light designed to withstand vehicles and the elements. Ideal for pathways, garden edges, and driveways.
features: Die-cast aluminum body with reinforced glass top
Pressure resistant (can bear up to 5 tons)
IP68 waterproof for heavy rains and snow
Multiple LED color options (white, warm white, blue)

faq.question: Is it car-safe?
faq.answer: Absolutely! It's designed to handle the weight of sedans, trucks, and light industrial vehicles.

faq.question: Can I use it around pools?
faq.answer: Yes. Its IP68 rating means it is fully waterproof and suitable for poolside lighting.

productDetails.name: EcoWall Shine
productDetails.description: EcoWall Shine is a modern, wall-mounted solar light with high brightness and motion detection, perfect for entrances, patios, and perimeter walls.
features: 3 intelligent lighting modes (Always On, Dim+Motion, Motion Only)
Tool-free mounting with adhesives or screws
productDetails.warranty: 3 years on battery and motion sensor

faq.question: Can it be installed without drilling?
faq.answer: Yes, high-strength adhesives are included for no-drill installations.

faq.question: Does the light stay on all night?
faq.answer: In Always On mode, it stays lit for up to 6 hours. Other modes conserve energy to extend lighting time.
